articles.title: Ukraine war: Battle for Bakhmut 'stabilising', says commander - BBC
articles.description: Despite Russia spending months trying to take the city, Ukrainian officials say they are holding on.
articles.content:
The battle for Bakhmut, the Ukrainian city which Russia has spent months trying to capture, is "stabilising", says Ukraine's commander-in-chief.
